TopicTitle: Story Time! (The Unintentional Adventures of Jeremy Kerman)

Articles.Content:
Hello all

Ok, so I decided to start a video series with a story line, because people tend to enjoy story based stuff in Youtube videos,

so I present the Unintentional adventures of Jeremy Kerman! For your enjoyment

It did involve me... voicing a video, something that I have always dreaded, there was not really any other way of getting the story across.

but it wasn't that bad in the end, hope you can bear my voice for the entirety of the video

Here you go:

...And that's what you get for being curious. Liked it, felt like The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy!

PS. Your voice was fine.

Liked it, felt like The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy!

Ha, ha, now that I think about it, it does bear some resemblance to Hitchhikers Guide, with the house being wrecked and him being whipped off into space like that.

But anyway, 3 weeks later and armed with a better microphone, I hath produced the second episode of the series, enjoy...

[+ If any passing Mods see this, you wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t mind moving this thread to the Fan Works section would you? IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve just read the posting Guidelines and I feel that this story-based series belongs there rather than in this mission reports section.]

Thanks.
